languages.text: Залп по кратеру, где лежит зеркало, поднимает в воздух тучу пыли, блокирующей работу авгуров и визуальных датчиков. Удостовериться в уничтожении зеркала в ближайшее время будет невозможно... но, конечно, пережить удар оно не могло. Определенно.

The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.
languages.original_text: Залп по кратеру, где лежит зеркало, поднимает в воздух тучу пыли, блокирующей работу авгуров и визуальных датчиков. Удостовериться в уничтожении зеркала в ближайшее время будет невозможно... но, конечно, пережить удар оно не могло. Определенно.

traits.locale_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising tons of dust that blocks the Auger Array. There is no way to make sure the mirror is destroyed for now, but… it couldn't have survived such a powerful explosion. It just couldn't. Couldn't.

The crew blasts the crater, raising tons of dust that blocks the Auger Array. There is no way to make sure the mirror is destroyed for now, but… it couldn't have survived such a powerful explosion. It just couldn't. Couldn't.

The crew blasts the crater raising tons of dust, blocking the Auger Array. There is no way to make sure the mirror is destroyed for now, but… it couldn't have survived such a powerful explosion. It just couldn't.

The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

languages.text: 船员对火山口进行了爆破，掀起了大片大片的尘埃，连俄歇矩阵的扫描都被干扰了。暂时无法确认镜子是否已经破坏，但它不可能在如此猛烈的爆炸中幸存下来……绝对不可能。
languages.original_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

traits.locale_text: 船员对火山口进行了爆破，掀起了大片大片的尘埃，连俄歇矩阵的扫描都被干扰了。暂时无法确认镜子是否已经破坏，但它不可能在如此猛烈的爆炸中幸存下来……绝对不可能。

languages.text: La tripulación hace explotar el cráter, levantando una nube de polvo que bloquea las lecturas del augur. De momento es imposible confirmar la destrucción del espejo, pero no ha podido sobrevivir a una explosión tan potente... probablemente.
languages.original_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación hace explotar el cráter, levantando una nube de polvo que bloquea las lecturas del augur. De momento es imposible confirmar la destrucción del espejo, pero no ha podido sobrevivir a una explosión tan potente... probablemente.

languages.text: クルーはクレーターを爆破し、スキャナー・アレイを遮る砂煙を上げる。鏡が破壊されたかは当面確認できないが、これほど強力な爆発に耐えられるはずはないだろう…。絶対に不可能だ。
languages.original_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

traits.locale_text: クルーはクレーターを爆破し、スキャナー・アレイを遮る砂煙を上げる。鏡が破壊されたかは当面確認できないが、これほど強力な爆発に耐えられるはずはないだろう…。絶対に不可能だ。

languages.text: Die Crew sprengt den Krater. Eine Staubwolke steigt auf, die das Auguren-Array blockiert. Es lässt sich vorerst nicht bestätigen, ob der Spiegel zerstört wurde, doch eine solch mächtige Explosion kann er im Grunde nicht überlebt haben ... Bestimmt nicht.
languages.original_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew sprengt den Krater. Eine Staubwolke steigt auf, die das Auguren-Array blockiert. Es lässt sich vorerst nicht bestätigen, ob der Spiegel zerstört wurde, doch eine solch mächtige Explosion kann er im Grunde nicht überlebt haben ... Bestimmt nicht.

languages.text: L'équipage bombarde le cratère, soulevant un nuage de poussière qui bloque le scrutateur. Il est impossible de confirmer la destruction du miroir pour le moment, mais il n'a pas pu survivre à une telle explosion... Clairement pas.
languages.original_text: The crew blasts the crater, raising a cloud of dust that blocks the augur array. Confirming the mirror's destruction is impossible for the time being, but it could not have survived such a powerful explosion... Definitely not.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage bombarde le cratère, soulevant un nuage de poussière qui bloque le rayon des augures. Il est impossible de confirmer la destruction du miroir pour le moment, mais il n'a pas pu survivre à une telle explosion... Clairement pas.
